医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英国成立新科学中心以解决粮食不安全问题英国首相里希·苏纳克 (Rishi Sunak) 今天（11 月 20 日星期一）宣布，英国将建立一个新的科学中心，专家将在此开发气候适应型作物并确定全球粮食系统面临的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/UK-launches-new-science-center-to-address-food-insecurity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/UK-launches-new-science-center-to-address-food-insecurity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=409915a3-785d-457d-a0e1-c7d91d15b50b Mon, 20 Nov 2023 11:40:38 -0500 UK launches new science center to address food insecurity
信息源塑造大流行期间及之后的感染预防行为​在做出有关疾病预防的重要决定时，您听谁的？医疗机构？或者也许是你周围的人？您的回答可能会比您预期更多地揭示您的个人情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Information-sources-shape-in​​fection-preventive-behavior-during-pandemic-and-beyond.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Information-sources-shape-in​​fection-preventive-behavior-during-pandemic-and-beyond.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=899ddb49-35a6-42fd-8501-ab541cd47d40 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 11:36:13 -0500 Information sources shape infection-preventive behavior during pandemic and beyond
COVID-19 大流行对被忽视的热带病状况的影响宣布在 Zoonoses 杂志上发表新文章。 COVID-19 大流行威胁着全世界的公共卫生系统，无论是发达国家还是发展中国家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Effects-of-COVID-19-pandemic-on-the-status-of-neglected-tropical-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Effects-of-COVID-19-pandemic-on-the-status-of-neglected-tropical-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c82ce3ce-3964-4c48-9dd5-60d8d4c6fd01 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 11:32:51 -0500 Effects of COVID-19 pandemic on the status of neglected tropical diseases
研究人员开发基因分类器来预测 DCIS 癌症进展风险一组研究人员绘制了导管原位癌（DCIS）的分子图谱，在区分乳腺癌早期癌前病变是否会发展为侵袭性癌症或保持稳定方面取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Researchers-develop-gene-classifier-to-predict-DCIS-risk-of-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Researchers-develop-gene-classifier-to-predict-DCIS-risk-of-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57110b36-d3f5-4cce-9cb5-e52af1d93b93 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 11:28:52 -0500 Researchers develop gene classifier to predict DCIS risk of cancer progression
学术医疗中心可能有助于减轻黑人女性心血管护理中的结构性种族主义雪松-西奈史密特心脏研究所芭芭拉·史翠珊妇女心脏中心的研究人员发现，在学术医疗中心治疗的一组患有阻塞性冠状动脉疾病的女性中，种族和民族差异并未影响她们的长期结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Academic-medical-centers-may-help-mitigate-structural-racism-in-cardioangiography-care-for-Black-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Academic-medical-centers-may-help-mitigate-structural-racism-in-cardioangio-care-for-Black-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad2a455d-97d0-4e0a-acc4-005c2ebad9ee Mon, 20 Nov 2023 11:23:05 -0500 Academic medical centers may help mitigate structural racism in cardiovascular care for Black women
团结起来对抗抗生素耐药性：世界卫生组织访谈采访世界卫生组织 (WHO) 抗菌素耐药性部门抗菌素耐药性监测、预防和控制主任 Kitty van Weezenbeek。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Uniting-Against-Antimicrobial-Resistance-An-Interview-with-the-World-Health-Organization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Uniting-Against-Antimicrobial-Resistance-An-Interview-with-the-World-Health-Organization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8591bb7-561d-47eb-a582-09ae344d2246 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 09:50:00 -0500 Uniting Against Antimicrobial Resistance: An Interview with the World Health Organization

从动物性食品转向植物性食品可降低心脏病、糖尿病和死亡的风险用植物性食品替代动物性食品对心脏代谢健康和全因死亡率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Switching-from-animal-based-to-plant-based-foods-reduces-risk-of-heart-disease-diabetes-and-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Switching-from-animal-based-to-plant-based-foods-reduces-risk-of-heart-disease-diabetes-and-mortality.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d0a41d9-16de-4b0b-8952-9190e473b446 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 07:56:00 -0500 Switching from animal-based to plant-based foods reduces risk of heart disease, diabetes, and mortality

美国军方表示国家安全取决于“永远的化学品”国防部依赖数百种甚至数千种武器和产品，例如制服、电池和微电子产品，其中含有 PFAS，这是一种与严重健康状况有关的化学物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/US-military-says-national-security-depends-on-e28098forever-chemicalse28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/US-military-says-national-security-depends-on-e28098forever-chemicalse28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3884557-2116-47ae-9253-918e3e346bc1 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 06:46:38 -0500 US military says national security depends on ‘forever chemicals’
